key_responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models including data preprocessing, feature engineering, model selection, training and validation
Perform exploratory data analysis on structured and unstructured data to uncover patterns and insights
Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams of data scientists, engineers and business stakeholders to refine data requirements and deliver ML solutions
Create visualizations and reports translating complex ML findings into actionable business insights
Pursue learning in advanced ML techniques and incorporate cutting-edge research and tools into projects
Develop prototypes for predictive models and test effectiveness in real-world scenarios
Identify opportunities for reuse of insights, datasets, code and models across functions (HR, marketing, etc.)
Maintain clear verbal and written communication for data needs and results
